gameObjects

Class GameBlocks

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameObjects.GameBlocks

  • public class GameBlocks
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all game blocks in a game.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Tim Wostemeier

    • Field Detail

      • map

        private int[][] map
        Contains the location and type id of each block The map has to be at least 10 wide and 1 high (1 row) Used by creatMap()

        Contains the actual GameObjects that are placed in the game Created by creatMap()

      • initBlocksArray

        private void initBlocksArray()

      • createBlocks

        public void createBlocks()
        Create and place actual blocks on the playing field. Needs the following attributes to be initialized and/or set: -this.map //location of the blocks -this.blocks //container for all the blocks -this.game (.getLeft(), .getTop()) //x and y playing area offset -this.numRows //Number of rows of blocks -this.blockHeight and this.blockWidth //block dimensions
